content.prompt: Which of the following is indicated on the graph?

choices.label: Worldwide fertilizer use is declining with the rise of sustainable agriculture.
Developed countries in the core are using greater amounts of fertilizer.
Developing countries in the periphery are shifting to more sustainable agriculture and using smaller amounts of fertilizer.
Worldwide fertilizer use is increasing but faster in peripheral developing countries.
Worldwide fertilizer use is increasing but notably faster in core developed countries.

unit.text: 5: Agriculture and Rural Land-Use Patterns and Processes
